$schema.description: The schema URL, if you're seeing this you probably already know what it is.

current_version.description: The current selected version, must exist in the versions object.

versions.description: A map of different versions where the key is the name.

path.description: Path to the folder containing this version's 'Retail' and 'Runtime' folders and 'Launcher.exe'.

patch_level.description: The patch level of this version, assumes lower patch levels are the same. Set to -1 to move all base chunks and patches.

chunk_overrides.description: Overrides of patch levels for certain chunks.

^chunk(0|[1-9][0-9]?)$.description: The patch level of this chunk, assumes lower patch levels are the same. Set to -1 to move base chunk and all patches.
